purpose: The email announces a call for applications for six full-time, tenure-track Assistant Professor positions in the Department of Computer Science at NOVA University Lisbon. The university is seeking candidates with expertise in various areas of computer science, including Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Software Engineering, among others. The selection process will focus on candidates' research abilities and how their expertise aligns with the department's strengths. The email outlines the application process, which consists of two stages, and specifies that first-stage applications must be submitted by May 29, 2025, although applications will be accepted until the positions are filled.

evidence_sentences: The Department of Computer Science at NOVA University Lisbon invites applications for six full-time, tenure-track Assistant Professor faculty positions in Computer Science.
We are primarily interested in recruiting excellent candidates in the areas of the department’s research groups on Computer Systems, Intelligent Systems, Multimodal Systems, and Software Systems.
Exceptional candidates in other areas of Computer Science will also be considered.
The selection process focuses on a candidate's proven research ability and dedication, and how their expertise complements the Department’s established strengths.
Tenure-track candidates should demonstrate exceptional research potential and the ability to work both independently and collaboratively.
We will conduct a two-stage application process.
During the first stage, we invite interested candidates to submit, by email to [log in to unmask]: a current CV, a cover letter including a short research statement, and three sample publications.
For full consideration, first-stage applications must be received by May 29, 2025.
